about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Library Applications for gravitational wave data
analysis.  This package contains applications that are built on tools
in the LSC Algorithm Library.

The LSC Algorithm Library Applications for gravitational wave data
analysis.  This package contains applications that are built on tools
in the LSC Algorithm Library.

name: lalsuite
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "lalsuite" %}
{% set version = "7.25" %}

{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

# sub-package versions
{% set lal_version = "7.6.1" %}
{% set lalframe_version = "3.0.6" %}
{% set lalmetaio_version = "4.0.5" %}
{% set lalsimulation_version = "6.1.0" %}
{% set lalburst_version = "2.0.6" %}
{% set lalinspiral_version = "5.0.2" %}
{% set lalinference_version = "4.1.8" %}
{% set lalpulsar_version = "7.1.0" %}
{% set lalapps_version = "10.0.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://software.igwn.org/sources/source/lalsuite/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7c36a3e19a35d15b6c8fc4efed760ce44a505176f9670b7a017e57c6ec73869d

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install -vv .

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=38.3.0
    - wheel
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - lal {{ lal_version }}.*
    - lalframe {{ lalframe_version }}.*
    - lalmetaio {{ lalmetaio_version }}.*
    - lalsimulation {{ lalsimulation_version }}.*
    - lalburst {{ lalburst_version }}.*
    - lalinspiral {{ lalinspiral_version }}.*
    - lalpulsar {{ lalpulsar_version }}.*
    - lalinference {{ lalinference_version }}.*
    - lalapps {{ lalapps_version }}.*

test:
  imports:
    - lal
    - lalframe
    - lalmetaio
    - lalsimulation
    - lalburst
    - lalinspiral
    - lalpulsar
    - lalinference
    - lalapps
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    # needed for run_test.py
    - pytest
  source_files:
    # needed for run_test.py
    - setup.cfg
  commands:
    # run_test.py checks that the versions are up-to-date
    # check requirements
    - python -m pip check
    # show metadata
    - python -m pip show lalsuite

about:
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite.git
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm Library Suite
  description: |
    The LSC Algorithm Library Applications for gravitational wave data
    analysis.  This package contains applications that are built on tools
    in the LSC Algorithm Library.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo
